main event: On 12 February 1956, a fighter aircraft reported a green object with a red light rapidly circling around it in Goose Bay, Labrador.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately one minute,The object was detected both visually and on radar,15 minutes after the initial contact, radar picked up the object again but with no movement,As the aircraft approached the object, it faded out of sight,The conclusion in the report indicates the object was probably a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: one green object with a red light
witness description: Fighter pilots from a training mission
